Package controller

Class Game

java.lang.Object
controller.Game
public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
The main controller of the program. Each of the functions in the game function similar to a "in game command"

      java.io.IOException

    • movePiece

      public void movePiece​(Move move)
      Moves the point at the start point of move to the end point of move.
      Parameters:
      move - the move representing the change being applied to the board

    • movePiece

      private void movePiece​(Move move, boolean addToUndoHistory)
      Helper function to process the move request.
      Parameters:
      move - the move representing the change being applied to the board
      addToUndoHistory - whether to store an equivalent undo command for the move

    • getEndPoint

      public java.util.Set<Point> getEndPoint​(Point point)
      Get the list of possible moves for the given point, which will be non-empty if there is a movable piece at that point.
      Parameters:
      point - the point that was clicked on the GUI
      Returns:
      a list of possible moves

    • save

      public void save​(java.lang.String fileName) throws java.io.IOException
      Save the current state of the game to a file, that can later loaded for playing.
      Parameters:
      fileName - name of the file holding the level
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • load

      public void load​(View observer, java.lang.String fileName) throws java.io.IOException
      Load the specified the game so that it can be played.
      Parameters:
      observer - reference to the view where the board should be displayed
      fileName - name of the text file that holds the level to be loaded
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • cleanGame

      private void cleanGame​(View observer, java.lang.String levelName)
      Clears the game of any previous game history
      Parameters:
      observer - reference to the view where the board should be displayed
      levelName - the name of the level that is being played

    • resetLevel

      public void resetLevel​(View observer) throws java.io.IOException
      Reset the game to the passed in level.
      Parameters:
      observer - A view to add to the new board
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • hint

      public java.util.Optional<Move> hint()
      Gets the hint for the next move that has to be applied to get closer to the winning board.
      Returns:
      If there is a hint for the next move (solution has been generated and current board is not winning), then return that move.

    • redo

      public void redo()
      Redo an undo that was previously made.

    • undo

      public void undo()
      Undo a move that was previously made.

    • gameWon

      public boolean gameWon()
      Returns whether the current board is the victory board.
      Returns:
      true if the current board is a victory board.
